short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for simple note taking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OneNote is an extension for storing quick notes that automatically saves. Some use cases might include Youtube URLs, reminders, and multiple emails. Updates will be coming!
